alert.note: Alert for Apache; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 25 at 5:03PM MST until August 25 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL NAVAJO AND WESTERN APACHE COUNTIES... At 501 PM MST, Heavy rain from earlier thunderstorms deposited between 1 and 2 inches of rainfall from Keams Canyon to Indian Wells. While the rainfall has ended...run off will continue through early evening across local washes and drainages as well as low water crossings. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Keams Canyon, Cedar Springs, Tees Toh, Dilkon, Seba Dalkai, Castle Butte, Indian Wells, White Cone, Jeddito, Jadito, Navajo, Hopi Reservation and Navajo Reservation. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
